T02TD1892E:220b-1: shr'i sa m'a dza lo ke shva ra s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02TD1892E:220b-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02TD1892E:220b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1892E:220b-5: sprul pa'i 'od zer dpag med pa //
T02TD1892E:220b-7: rnam rtog med bde'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1892E:221a-2: dpal ldan 'dus pa snang ba che //
T02TD1892E:221a-3: rgyud rgyal rim ba la brten te //
T02TD1892E:221a-4: 'jig rten mgon po sgrub pa yi //
T02TD1892E:221a-5: rim pa mdor bsdus gsal bar bri //
T02TD1892E:221a-6: dang bo snying rje'i stobs las byung //
T02TD1892E:221a-7: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems brtan byas //
T02TD1892E:221a-8: srid pa'i longs spyod bde ba chags //
T02TD1892E:221a-9: yongs su 'dzin pa rgyab kyis phyogs //
T02TD1892E:221a-10: dang sogs nor ni phun tshogs rnams //
T02TD1892E:221a-11: bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam gus //
T02TD1892E:221a-12: des bstan dam tshig spyod pa ni //
T02TD1892E:221a-13: yongs su skyong la rab tu brtson //
T02TD1892E:221a-14: bum pa gsang sogs dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1892E:221a-15: bla ma'i drin gyis yang dag thob //
T02TD1892E:221a-16: lus ngag sems rnams dag pa nyid //
T02TD1892E:221a-17: sgrub pa po ni dngos grub ba snod //
T02TD1892E:221a-18: ting 'dzin yan lag las byung ba'i //
T02TD1892E:221a-19: tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs pa las //
T02TD1892E:221a-20: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1892E:221a-21: de ltar gsangs sngags tshul gnas yin //
T02TD1892E:221a-22: ting 'dzin yan lag nyams gyur cing //
T02TD1892E:221a-23: de yi mi mthun phyogs gnas na //
T02TD1892E:221a-24: skye ba bye ba stong gis kyang //
T02TD1892E:221a-26: de bas ting 'dzin rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD1892E:221a-27: gsang sngags spyod gnas rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1892E:221a-28: de las gzhan pa'i sems spangs te //
T02TD1892E:221a-29: g-yeng med brtson pas 'bad par bya //
T02TD1892E:221a-30: ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag dang ;
T02TD1892E:221a-31: / mi mthun phyogs gang nges bya'i phyir //
T02TD1892E:221a-32: ting 'dzin yan lag mi mthun phyogs //
T02TD1892E:221a-33: de ni mdor bsdus nas bshad bya //
T02TD1892E:221a-34: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T02TD1892E:221a-35: longs spyod rnams la ltos med cing //
T02TD1892E:221a-36: bzod ldan dam bcas brtan pa dang //
T02TD1892E:221a-38: lus dang ngag yid las rnams la //
T02TD1892E:221a-39: shes bzhin dang ni ldan pa la //
T02TD1892E:221a-40: sangs rgyas rgya skur rtog dran pa yis //
T02TD1892E:221a-41: lus kyi rjes dran yang dag ldan //
T02TD1892E:221a-42: dus gang du ni gang bya ba'i //
T02TD1892E:221a-43: rjes dran de la brtan pa dang //
T02TD1892E:221a-44: sgrib pa ldan ni spong ba dang //
T02TD1892E:221a-45: zas kyi tshod rig spyod lam rang //
T02TD1892E:221a-46: 'jig rten chos ni thams cad la //
T02TD1892E:221a-47: rtag tu sems ni btang snyoms dang //
T02TD1892E:221a-48: yo byad bsnyungs 'di yan lag ste //
T02TD1892E:221a-49: go bzlog pa ni mi mthun phyogs //
T02TD1892E:221a-50: yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug nas bgegs bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:221a-51: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02TD1892E:221b-1: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam phat /
T02TD1892E:221b-2: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ro a'adzny'a pa ya ti /
T02TD1892E:221b-3: sarbba dusht'a n'am k'a ya b'aka tsitta k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1892E:221b-4: sngags 'dis phyogs bcu'i bgegs thams cad bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:221b-5: de nas rang gi snying gar dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po yongs su gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge hri dmar po bsams la /
T02TD1892E:221b-6: de'i 'od zer spros pas rang gi lus sngag bar byas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD1892E:221b-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas /
T02TD1892E:221b-8: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba bkul pa dang /
T02TD1892E:221b-9: rje btsun bla ma yang nam mkha' la dmigs te /
T02TD1892E:221b-10: aom sa rabba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'ak tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD1892E:221b-12: de nas yi ge hri de nyid las 'od zer gyi tshogs kha dog sna tshogs pa spro ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD1892E:221b-13: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs yang dag par spros la /
T02TD1892E:221b-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1892E:221b-15: zhes bzlas shing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bla ma legs par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:221b-16: de rnams kyi spyan sngar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD1892E:221b-17: 'di ltar sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD1892E:221b-18: gang zhig thog med srid pa'i chu klung du //
T02TD1892E:221b-19: ma lus kun rtog gis bsgags rnyog pa rnams //
T02TD1892E:221b-20: thugs rje che ldan spyan sngar de dag ni //
T02TD1892E:221b-21: cho ga bzhin du thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02TD1892E:221b-22: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1892E:221b-23: 'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang mdzad pa //
T02TD1892E:221b-24: de dag kun la yang dag yid rang zhing //
T02TD1892E:221b-25: byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo bar bgyi //
T02TD1892E:221b-26: yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs //
T02TD1892E:221b-27: snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa yi thabs //
T02TD1892E:221b-28: rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi //
T02TD1892E:221b-29: bde gshegs rnams la rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1892E:221b-30: rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing //
T02TD1892E:221b-31: sems dpa' dam pa rnams ni phun tshogs gzhi //
T02TD1892E:221b-32: dngos po thams cad ro gcig ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1892E:221b-33: dam pa'i chos la rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1892E:222a-2: snying rje mchog gis bskrun pa'i dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1892E:222a-3: rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab bzhugs pa //
T02TD1892E:222a-4: brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1892E:222a-5: bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur pa //
T02TD1892E:222a-6: sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags yang dag 'byin //
T02TD1892E:222a-7: lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1892E:222a-8: sems ni byang chub dam par bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD1892E:222a-9: bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyi lam gcig pu //
T02TD1892E:222a-10: sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul //
T02TD1892E:222a-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo blos //
T02TD1892E:222a-12: yang dag nyid dud ni gnas par bgyi //
T02TD1892E:222a-13: de ltar lam la gnas pa'i bar du byas //
T02TD1892E:222a-15: ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir stong pa ste //
T02TD1892E:222a-16: rang bzhin rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med //
T02TD1892E:222a-17: rtog pa rnams dang bral phyir dngos po ni //
T02TD1892E:222a-18: ma lus smon pa las ni nges par grol //
T02TD1892E:222a-19: zhes bya bas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i spros pa thams cad dang bral bas khams gsum po ma lus pa stong par bsgoms la /
T02TD1892E:222a-20: 'dis stong pa nyid du byin gyis brlab pa bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:222a-21: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1892E:222a-22: de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don stong ba'i bdag nyid can gyi sems de nyid yi ge aa dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam /
T02TD1892E:222a-23: de'i steng du h'um nag po yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa nga po kha gyes pa lte ba'i yi ge h'um gis mtshan pa nyi ma la gnas pa bsam mo //
T02TD1892E:222a-24: de nas de las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer phyogs bcur kun du 'phros pas bgegs thams cad bsal la /
T02TD1892E:222a-25: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer de nyid las rdo rjer ba dang dra ba dpangs dpag tshad brgya stong du ma yod pa /
T02TD1892E:222a-26: bdud thams cad kyis bsgrod par mi nus pa /
T02TD1892E:222a-27: phyogs thams cad du khyab pa'i phyi rol na dus mtha'i me'i phung po 'bar ba lta bus bskor ba dang /
T02TD1892E:222a-28: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor sa'i 'og gi mthar thug pa bsams la /
T02TD1892E:222a-29: de'i dbus su chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya gyen kar gnas pa steng yangs pa /
T02TD1892E:222a-31: nam mkha'i khams rgya che ba khongs su chud pa /
T02TD1892E:222b-0: stong ka'i zla ba ltar dkar bar bsams @222b la ;
T02TD1892E:222b-1: de'i dbus su yi ge pam ser po las byung ba'i sna tshogs padma rgya che ba /
T02TD1892E:222b-2: de'i dbus su yi ge h'um nag po las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD1892E:222b-3: de'i dbus su zla ba la gnas pa'i yi brum dkar po yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa de'i lte bar zla ba gnas pa'i yi ge brum bsams la /
T02TD1892E:222b-4: de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po dang /
T02TD1892E:222b-6: dmar po gsum gyis rnam par mdzes pa /
T02TD1892E:222b-8: phyag dang po gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:222b-9: g-yas kyi gnyes pa na 'khor lo dkar po /
T02TD1892E:222b-11: phyag g-yon gyi gnyis pa na rin po che /
T02TD1892E:222b-12: gsum pa na padma dmar po bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:222b-13: ral pa dang cod pan mnga' ba /
T02TD1892E:222b-14: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la /
T02TD1892E:222b-15: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD1892E:222b-16: 'od zer dkar po'i tshogs rnam par 'phro ba bsams la /
T02TD1892E:222b-17: de yongs su gyur pa las khang pa brtsegs ma rim pa gnyis /
T02TD1892E:222b-18: rin po che sna tshogs 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin can /
T02TD1892E:222b-19: phyi'i rim pa zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa /
T02TD1892E:222b-21: ba dan dang rgyal mtshan kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la dril bu btags pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang /
T02TD1892E:222b-22: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD1892E:222b-25: dra ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes pa /
T02TD1892E:222b-26: phyi rol na gzugs kyi gnas kyi kha khyer rdo rje rin po che nye bar mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'o //
T02TD1892E:222b-27: nang gi rim pa zlum po la rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor ba /
T02TD1892E:222b-28: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa /
T02TD1892E:222b-29: sdong bu dang bcas pa'i sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la gnas pa'i zla ba bcu gnyis dang /
T02TD1892E:222b-30: nyi ma bdun gyi gdan dang ldan pa rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD1892E:222b-31: der dbus ma'i zla ba'i gdan la dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug nyis 'gyur du byas pa yongs su gyur ba las /
T02TD1892E:222b-32: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyur gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD1892E:222b-33: de'i steng du ka la sogs pa gsal bya'i yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi dang da dha da dha ya la zhes bya ba'i yi ge drug gis bsnan pa nyis 'gyur du byas pa dkar po brgyad cu yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD1892E:223a-0: @223a * // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu skyed par byed pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:223a-1: de ltar shes rab dang thams kyi rang bzhin gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bsgoms pa las kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur nas /
T02TD1892E:223a-2: chos thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar rtags pas me long lta bu'i ye shes skye ba yin no //
T02TD1892E:223a-3: de nas zla ba de gnyes gcig tu gyur pas rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa'i dbye ba med pas /
T02TD1892E:223a-4: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yin no //
T02TD1892E:223a-5: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la yi ge h'um dmar po bsams la /
T02TD1892E:223a-6: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje dmar po de'i lte bar yi ge h'um dmar po dang bcas par bsams la /
T02TD1892E:223a-7: rjed pa dang brjod par bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnas gyur pa las ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1892E:223a-8: de nas rdo rje de dang yi ge h'um las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'gro ba rnams rnam par sbyangs la rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par bskyed de /
T02TD1892E:223a-9: lte ba la yi ge h'um dang bcas pa'i rdo rjer bcug la /
T02TD1892E:223a-11: zhes bya bas nga rgyal bya'o //
T02TD1892E:223a-12: de ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa'i bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin no //
T02TD1892E:223a-13: de nas zla ba dang rdo rje dang /
T02TD1892E:223a-14: yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa sngon du 'gro ba las bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i sku shel gong dag pa 'dra ba zhal gsum pa /
T02TD1892E:223a-19: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma la 'khyud pa ;
T02TD1892E:223a-20: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pas rdo rje dmar po /
T02TD1892E:223a-22: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis pas rin po che /
T02TD1892E:223a-24: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD1892E:223a-25: gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma dag pa dang bral bas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid bskyed pa rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD1892E:223a-26: 'dod tshogs chen pos 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la bltas te de yang dag par sbyang bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:223a-27: de la 'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyang ba'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1892E:223b-0: rab tu @223b dga' ba'i sgras nam mkha'i khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02TD1892E:223b-1: spyan la sogs pa nas re rdo rje'i mthar thug pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su phyung la /
T02TD1892E:223b-2: rang gi shes rab kyi lus la gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:223b-3: de nas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02TD1892E:223b-4: byang chub kyi sems zhu bar gyur pa rang dang 'dra ba'i padma'i lte bar h'um gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhub ba'i dkyil 'khor du rnam par bsams la /
T02TD1892E:223b-5: de yongs su gyur ba las rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor lha bcud dgu'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang ba gtso bor gyur par bsams la /
T02TD1892E:223b-6: der sems can rnams blos bcug nas /
T02TD1892E:223b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02TD1892E:223b-9: de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems zhu bar gyur pa rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste /
T02TD1892E:223b-10: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsis dbang bskur nas /
T02TD1892E:223b-11: kshim dzrim kham gam shkam sam gi sa bon las mig dang /
T02TD1892E:223b-16: yid kyi dbang po'i bdag nyid can /
T02TD1892E:223b-17: 'og nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang ldan pa'i sa'i snying po dang /
T02TD1892E:223b-21: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /
T02TD1892E:223b-22: kun du bzang po'i rnam par bskyed de dbyung bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:223b-23: dza:h'um bam ho:kham ram gyis sa bon las gzugs rdo rje dang /
T02TD1892E:223b-28: chos kyi dbyings rdo rjer gyur pa gzugs dang /
T02TD1892E:223b-33: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1892E:223b-34: 'go nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag dang ldan pa dbyung bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:223b-35: l'am m'am p'am t'am gis sa bon las ;
T02TD1892E:223b-39: rlung gi bdag nyid can spyan dang /
T02TD1892E:223b-42: sgrol ma 'go nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag dang ldan pa dbyung bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:223b-43: bh'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um gis bon las /
T02TD1892E:224a-3: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1892E:224a-7: mi bskyod pa dbyung bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:224a-8: de nas brten pa'i dkyil 'khor de thams cad stong zhing nam mkha' lta bur bsams la /
T02TD1892E:224a-9: de'i 'og tu aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum kha dog dkar po dang /
T02TD1892E:224a-14: thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin can /
T02TD1892E:224a-15: snying rje dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin ho:dmar po gnyis kyi nang du chud pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsams la /
T02TD1892E:224a-16: kha'i sgo nas rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02TD1892E:224a-17: rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma'i 'dod chags kyi mes zhu bar gyur pas rang gi rdo rje'i lam na phyung ste /
T02TD1892E:224a-18: rang dang 'dra ba'i chu skyes kyi ste ba'i nang du chud par bsams la /
T02TD1892E:224a-19: de'i stobs kyis bdag nyid rig ma dang bcas pa 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zhu bar gyur nas /
T02TD1892E:224a-20: dngul chu'i tshogs ltar 'od gsal bar blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:224a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin de nyid gdul bya'i skye bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs kyi sku yang dag par 'dzin pa'i don du /
T02TD1892E:224a-22: rang gi rgyud las tha mi dad pa'i byams pa dang /
T02TD1892E:224a-25: btang snyoms kyi ngo bo nyid /
T02TD1892E:224a-29: sgrol mas bskul ba'i glus rab tu sad bzhin par bsgom par bya'o ;
T02TD1892E:224a-30: / sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs //
T02TD1892E:224a-31: dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
T02TD1892E:224a-32: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1892E:224a-33: sa sems can yab chen gnyen ma chog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1892E:224a-34: rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan //
T02TD1892E:224a-35: sangs rgyas don du byang chub don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
T02TD1892E:224a-36: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1892E:224b-0: 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du @224b gsol ;
T02TD1892E:224b-1: khyed ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba //
T02TD1892E:224b-2: 'jig rten dag ni don dang dgos pa mdzad la rab tu brtson //
T02TD1892E:224b-3: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1892E:224b-4: dga' spyod pa kun du bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1892E:224b-5: khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che //
T02TD1892E:224b-6: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid thugs brtse ba //
T02TD1892E:224b-7: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mches bzhed na //
T02TD1892E:224b-8: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dbyes par mdzod //
T02TD1892E:224b-9: de ltar glus yang dag par bskul ba'i 'og tu dngos po thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bsams la /
T02TD1892E:224b-10: 'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba'i skye bo dang rjes su mthun pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bdag nyid bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1892E:224b-11: zhu ba de yongs su gyur pa las yi ge hr'i:dmar po'o //
T02TD1892E:224b-12: de yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po'i dbus na zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge hr'i:'od zer rnam par 'phro ba rnam par bsams la /
T02TD1892E:224b-13: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa snang bar byas te /
T02TD1892E:224b-14: gdul bya'i sems can gyi khams rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par sbyangs nas /
T02TD1892E:224b-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'og nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang zhal dang /
T02TD1892E:224b-17: mtshan ma dang ldan par byas la /
T02TD1892E:224b-18: padma dmar po yi ge hr'i:sa mtshan pa de nyid du bcug nas padma dang /
T02TD1892E:224b-19: zla ba dang yi ge hr'i:de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal gsum pa /
T02TD1892E:224b-21: sku thams cad dang zhal dang po dmar ba /
T02TD1892E:224b-22: zhal g-yas ba sngo zhing g-yon pa dkar ba /
T02TD1892E:224b-23: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:224b-24: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na padma /
T02TD1892E:224b-25: gsum pa nang la gri bsnyams pa /
T02TD1892E:224b-26: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis na rin po che /
T02TD1892E:224b-27: gsum pa na 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:225a-0: ral pa dang cod pan dang ldan par bdag gnyid rnam par @225a * //
T02TD1892E:225a-2: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mi gnas pa'i don du sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:225a-3: aom dha rnam dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1892E:225a-4: 'di dag rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang bsnyen pa'i yan lag chung ngu yin no //
T02TD1892E:225a-5: de'i 'og tu mig gnyis su aa dkar po las zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge kshim dang 'khor lo yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD1892E:225a-6: sa'i snying po rin po che'i chod pan can zhal dang phyag dang mtshan ma la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba ste de'i 'og ma rnams la de bzhin no //
T02TD1892E:225a-7: de bzhin du rnam ba gnyis su zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge dzrim sngon po dang rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las phyag na rdo rje 'og nas bshad pa'i mi bskyod pa lta bu'o //
T02TD1892E:225a-8: sna la zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge kham ser po dang rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa yongs su gyur pa las nam mkha'i snying po rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o //
T02TD1892E:225a-9: lce zla ba la gnas pa'i gam dmar po dang padma dmar po yongs su gyur pa las 'jig rten dbang phyag 'od dpag tu med pa lta bu'o /
T02TD1892E:225a-10: thod pa'i nang du zla ba la gnas pa'i ksham ljang gu dang ral gri yongs su gyur pa las sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba don yod par grub pa lta bu'o //
T02TD1892E:225a-11: lte bar zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge sam dkar po dang rdo rje dmar po yongs su gyur pa las sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1892E:225a-12: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu dang nye par sgrub pa chung ngu'o //
T02TD1892E:225a-15: sprul pa'i sku gsum bskyed par bya ba'i don du thugs kyi gsungs ba la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa 'di ltar bya ste /
T02TD1892E:225a-16: rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa ste bar zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um bsams la /
T02TD1892E:225a-17: de'i 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i thugs rdo rje'i sprul pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'gro ba rnams thugs rdo rje'i rnam pa bskyed pa /
T02TD1892E:225a-18: yang snying gar gnas pa'i yi ge h'um de nyid du bcug nas /
T02TD1892E:225a-19: yi ge h'um dang zla ba dang rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las thugs rdo rje zhes sdang rdo rje lta bu'i rin po che'i chod pan can bsams la /
T02TD1892E:225b-0: de'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i @225b yi ge h'um sngon po las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi sgo rnams las thugs rdo rje'i tshogs rnam par spros la de'i 'od zer gyis thog ma med pa nas grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rdo rje'i tshogs spyan drangs la nam mkha'i kham kun du dgang ngo //
T02TD1892E:225b-1: de las h'um de nyid las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD1892E:225b-2: thus rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya / dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba //
T02TD1892E:225b-3: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsams pas //
T02TD1892E:225b-4: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1892E:225b-5: rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol /
T02TD1892E:225b-6: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1892E:225b-7: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsams pas //
T02TD1892E:225b-8: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1892E:225b-9: rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol /
T02TD1892E:225b-10: de nas rang gi sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par lhag par mos shing ;
T02TD1892E:225b-11: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1892E:225b-12: zhes byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:225b-13: de'i steng lkog ma'i 'og tu zla ba la gnas pa'i padma dmar po'i lte ba la gnas pa'i zla ba la yi ge hr'i:dmar po bsams la /
T02TD1892E:225b-14: de las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug nas yi ge hr'i:las gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa spros te /
T02TD1892E:225b-15: de rnams kyis de yang dag par mchod nas yi ge hr'i:de nyid du bcug la de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las ye shes sems dpa' bsam zhing /
T02TD1892E:225b-16: de'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i rang gi sa bon bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:225b-17: de'i gong du lkog mar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a'a:dmar po yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po de'i dbus su zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge a'a:bsams la /
T02TD1892E:225b-18: de'i 'od zer 'phros pa'i sgo nas byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs rdo rje sprul pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'gro ba rnams gsungs rdo rje'i rnam par bskyed la /
T02TD1892E:225b-19: yang lkog mar gnas pa'i a'a:de nyid du bcug nas yi ge a'a:dang zla ba dang padma yongs su gyur las /
T02TD1892E:225b-20: gsung rdo rje 'dod chags rdo rje lta bu rin po che'i chod pan bsams la /
T02TD1892E:226a-0: de'i lkog mar zla ba la gnas pa'i a'a:dmar po las byung ba'i 'od @226a * //
T02TD1892E:226a-1: zer gyi sgo rnams las gsung rdo rje'i tshogs rnams spros la /
T02TD1892E:226a-2: de'i 'od zer gyis sngon grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis nam mkha'i gtos bkang la de bzhin du gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pas de rnams yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD1892E:226a-3: rang nyid gsung rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:226a-4: chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan /
T02TD1892E:226a-5: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1892E:226a-6: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1892E:226a-7: rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1892E:226a-8: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1892E:226a-9: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1892E:226a-10: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1892E:226a-11: rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1892E:226a-12: de nas de rnams rang gi gsung rdo rjer bcug la 'di ltar nga rgyal bya'o //
T02TD1892E:226a-13: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta b'aka badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1892E:226a-14: de nas mgo por zla ba la gnas pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge aom dkar po bsams la /
T02TD1892E:226a-15: de las spros pa'i 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sku rdo rje dang /
T02TD1892E:226a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje snga ma bzhin du nam mkha'i gtos gang bar bsams la /
T02TD1892E:226a-17: de nas snga ma bzhin du gzugs rdo rje la sogs pas de rnams yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD1892E:226a-18: mgo bo'i yi ge aom du bcug la sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:226a-19: dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba //
T02TD1892E:226a-20: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1892E:226a-21: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su ;
T02TD1892E:226a-22: / rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1892E:226a-23: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1892E:226a-24: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1892E:226a-25: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1892E:226a-26: rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1892E:226a-27: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pas /
T02TD1892E:226a-28: rang nyid sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:226a-29: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1892E:226a-30: 'di dag ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu dang sgrub pa chung ngu yin no //
T02TD1892E:226b-0: de nas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis @226b de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bkug la /
T02TD1892E:226b-1: mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su bzhugs par bsams nas /
T02TD1892E:226b-2: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1892E:226b-3: mchod chen ji ltar mdzad pa ltar //
T02TD1892E:226b-4: bdag kyang rtog par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1892E:226b-5: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD1892E:226b-6: zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab pa'i tshigs su bcad pas dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02TD1892E:226b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las byung ba'i spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo ye shes kyi bdud rtsis yongs su gang ba'i rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa rnams kyis gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD1892E:226b-8: rol mo dang bkra shis kyi glu rnams sna tshogs pa'i ca co 'don pas bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bsams la /
T02TD1892E:226b-9: byang chub kyi sems de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD1892E:226b-10: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dbu'i steng gi cod pan la bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:226b-11: 'di ni dbang gi 'bras bu chung ngu dang /
T02TD1892E:226b-12: sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag chung ngu yin no //
T02TD1892E:226b-13: de nas rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma yang bdag nyid sngar bsnyen pa chung ngu la sogs pa'i rim pas mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1892E:226b-14: thugs dang gsung dang sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1892E:226b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD1892E:226b-16: yan lag bzhi pa bar ma rdzogs par byas nas rigs lnga dang bsre bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:226b-17: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1892E:226b-18: nu ma yan chad nas mgo bo'i bar du yi ge aom dkar po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD1892E:226b-19: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phra rab kyi rang bzhin nu ma'i 'og nas lte ba yan chad du yi ge h'um sngon po yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa'i phra rab kyi rang bzhin /
T02TD1892E:226b-20: lte ba'i 'og nas rked pa'i bar du yi ge sv'a sar po yongs su gyur pa las rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phra rab kyi rang bzhin /
T02TD1892E:226b-21: padma nas brla gnyis su yi ge a'a:dmar po yongs su gyur pa las 'od dpag tu med pa'i phra rab kyi rang bzhin /
T02TD1892E:226b-22: pus mo gnyis nas brtsams te /
T02TD1892E:227a-0: rkang mthil gnyis kyi mthar thug par yi ge h'a ljang gu yongs su gyur pa las don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin @227a * //
T02TD1892E:227a-2: / de ltar rang gi rig ma la rigs lnga dang bsre ba dmigs la /
T02TD1892E:227a-3: de nas yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rang gi rdo rje /
T02TD1892E:227a-4: aom yongs su gyur pa las nor bu /
T02TD1892E:227a-5: bu gar phat kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1892E:227a-6: rang gi rig ma la yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las padma /
T02TD1892E:227a-7: yi ge a'a: yongs su gyur pa las lte bar bsam mo //
T02TD1892E:227a-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i bde ba la yang dag par longs spyod pa'i mchod pa'i don du rang dang 'dra ba dang lhan cig dga' ba tsam par byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:227a-9: aom sarbba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko&amp ;
T02TD1892E:227a-11: 'di dag ni dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1892E:227a-12: de'i 'og tu rab tu dga' ba'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa lnga khar bcug la 'dod chags chen po'i mes zhu bar gyur nas rdo rje'i lam nas phyung la /
T02TD1892E:227a-13: rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma'i chu skyes kyi nang du byang chub kyi sems zhu ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge hr'i:dmar pos byin gyis brlab par bsams la /
T02TD1892E:227a-14: de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i bdag por gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mngon par sprul la /
T02TD1892E:227a-15: bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir phyi rol du spro bar bya ste /
T02TD1892E:227a-16: a'a ro lik ces pas 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po dang /
T02TD1892E:227a-19: dkar po zhal gsum dang ldan pa /
T02TD1892E:227a-20: phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:227a-21: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na padma dmar po /
T02TD1892E:227a-22: gsum pa na ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:227a-23: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis pa na rin po che /
T02TD1892E:227a-24: gsum pa na 'khor lo bsnams pa phyung la sgros pas 'gro ba rnams gsung gi rdo rje'i rnam par byas nas /
T02TD1892E:227a-25: de'i skur bcug la de yang rang gi lus la dngos po thams cad kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:227a-26: de bzhin du thams cad du yang spro ba dang bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:227a-27: de nas dzin dzik ces bya bas rnam par snang mdzad snga ma lta bu phyung la shar phyogs kyi zla ba la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:227a-28: de'i 'og tu ratna dhrik ces bya bas rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po /
T02TD1892E:227b-0: dkar po dang ldan pa phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis @227b kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:227b-1: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na rin po che ljang gu /
T02TD1892E:227b-2: gsum pa na ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:227b-3: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis pa na 'khor lo /
T02TD1892E:227b-4: gsum pa na padma bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:227b-5: lho phyogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:227b-6: de nas badzra dhrik ces bya bas mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po /
T02TD1892E:227b-7: zhal gsum pa sngo ba dang /
T02TD1892E:227b-10: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:227b-11: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na zhi ba'i rdo rje nag po /
T02TD1892E:227b-12: gsum pa na ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:227b-13: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis pa na nor bu /
T02TD1892E:227b-14: gsum pa na padma bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:227b-15: nub phyogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:227b-16: de'i 'og tu pradzny'a dhrik ces bya bas don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum pa /
T02TD1892E:227b-19: dkar po phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:227b-20: phyag g-yas pa'i gnyis pa na ral gri /
T02TD1892E:227b-21: gsum pa na 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:227b-22: phyag g-yon pa'i gnyis pa na rin po che /
T02TD1892E:227b-23: gsum pa na padma bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:227b-24: byang phyogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:227b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po ni nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02TD1892E:227b-26: ral pa dang cod pan can yin la /
T02TD1892E:227b-27: rnam par snang mdzad ni zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
T02TD1892E:227b-28: de nas mo ha r'a ti zhes bya bas lha mo spyan zhal dang phyag la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba me'i phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:227b-29: de nas dve sha r'a ti zhes bya bas m'a ma k'i zhal dang phyag la sogs pa mi bskyod pa dang 'dra ba bden bral gyi phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:227b-30: de nas r'a ga ra ti zhes bya bas lha mo gos dkar mo zhal dang phyag la sogs pa 'od dpag tu med pa dang 'dra ba rlung gi phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:227b-31: de nas badzra r'a ti zhes bya bas sgrol ma zhal dang phyag la sogs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'dra ba rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa phyag gnyis pa na autpala ser po kha phye ba /
T02TD1892E:228a-0: gsum pa na ral gri bsnams @228a * //
T02TD1892E:228a-2: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis na rin po che /
T02TD1892E:228a-3: gsum pa na 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:228a-4: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:228a-5: de'i 'og tu aom a'a:r'u pa badzra h'um /
T02TD1892E:228a-6: zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum gyi bar du ming bcug la /
T02TD1892E:228a-7: re re'i sngags brjod nas gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa nas chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i bar gyi mchod pa'i lha mo rnams rim bzhin du /
T02TD1892E:228a-13: chos kyi dbyings rdo rje go rims bzhin du sku mdog dkar ba dang /
T02TD1892E:228a-19: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:228a-20: phyag g-yas pa'i gnyis pa na me long dang /
T02TD1892E:228a-25: chos 'byung ba'i mtshan ma bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:228a-26: phyag lhag ma rnams na rim bzhin du ral gri dang /
T02TD1892E:228a-29: rgyan dang na bza' la sogs pas brgyan pa zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02TD1892E:228a-30: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis legs par bzhugs pa /
T02TD1892E:228a-31: rim pa gnyis pa'i me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams dang /
T02TD1892E:228a-32: shar phyogs kyi sgo logs gnyis su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la snga ma bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:228a-33: de'i 'og tu ya m'anta krita ces bya bas gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal gsum pa nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po /
T02TD1892E:228a-34: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra bal 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:228a-35: phyag lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje tho ba dang /
T02TD1892E:228a-39: snga ma bzhin du phyung la spro ba la sogs pa bya ba sngon du 'gro bas shar phyogs kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:228a-40: de bzhin du pradzny'anta krita ces bya bas shes rab mthar byed sku mdog dmar po zhal gsum /
T02TD1892E:228a-44: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:228a-45: phyag lhag ma rnams na rdo rje dbyig pa dkar po dang /
T02TD1892E:228a-47: rin po che dang padma bsnams pa /
T02TD1892E:228b-0: snga ma bzhin du spro ba la sogs pa byas la lho phyogs kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor @228b la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:228b-1: de bzhin du padm'a ntakrita ces bya bas padma mthar byed sku mdog dmar ba /
T02TD1892E:228b-2: zhal gsum pa dmar po dang /
T02TD1892E:228b-6: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:228b-7: phyag lhag ma rnams na padma dmar po dang /
T02TD1892E:228b-10: rin po che bsnams pa snga ma bzhin du phyung la /
T02TD1892E:228b-11: spro ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD1892E:228b-12: nub kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag pa bya'o //
T02TD1892E:228b-13: de bzhin du bighn'anta krita ces bya bas bgegs mthar byed sku mdog nag po zhal gsum nag po dang /
T02TD1892E:228b-17: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1892E:228b-18: lhag ma rnams na rdo rje nag po kha gyes pa dang /
T02TD1892E:228b-22: snga ma bzhin du phyung la /
T02TD1892E:228b-23: spro ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD1892E:228b-24: byang phyogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o ;
T02TD1892E:228b-25: / khro bo thams cad kyang dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD1892E:228b-30: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02TD1892E:228b-31: klu chen po rnams kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD1892E:228b-32: zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02TD1892E:228b-33: ljags bskyod cing 'jigs su rung ba nyi ma'i 'od shas cher 'bar ba'o //
T02TD1892E:228b-34: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa bskyed cing brtan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:228b-35: de nas ye shes sems dpa'i snying po'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsams te rang gi sgo srung rnams kyis de'i ba gegs bskrad la yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02TD1892E:228b-36: rang gi sngags kyis mchod yon phul la /
T02TD1892E:228b-37: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnam par spros te yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD1892E:228b-38: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bya ba'i yi ge rnams kyis go rims ji bzhin du dgug pa dang /
T02TD1892E:228b-42: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chen po dang /
T02TD1892E:228b-43: bsnyen pa'i yan lag chen po yin no //
T02TD1892E:228b-44: de yang snga ma bzhin du mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chen po dang nye bar sgrub pa chen po yin no //
T02TD1892E:229a-0: de nas sngar bshad pa'i rim @229a * //
T02TD1892E:229a-1: pas sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni sgrub pa chen po dang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu chen po yin no //
T02TD1892E:229a-2: de nas dkyil 'khor ba thams cad kyi thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying po'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul la bkug ste ;
T02TD1892E:229a-3: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsams nas /
T02TD1892E:229a-4: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la dbang bskur ba'i don du gsol ba gdab bo /
T02TD1892E:229a-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku las byung ba'i lha mo spyan ma la sogs pa rnams ye shes kyi bdud rtsis yongs su gang ba'i rin po che'i bum pa thogs pas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1892E:229a-6: dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyi dbu la rang gi bdag por gyur pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:229a-7: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu la mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1892E:229a-8: mi bskyod pa'i dbu la ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1892E:229a-9: spyan dang gzugs rdo rje dang gshin rje gshed kyi dbu la ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1892E:229a-10: m'a ma k'i dang sgra rdo rje dang chos kyi dbyings rdo rje dang shes rab mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed kyi dbu la ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1892E:229a-11: gos dkar mo dang ro rdo rje dang rta mgrin gyi dbu la ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD1892E:229a-12: sgrol ma dang reg rdo rje'i dbu la ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD1892E:229a-13: dri rdo rje'i dbu la ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD1892E:229a-18: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02TD1892E:229a-19: kun du bzang po'i dbul ni go rims bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1892E:229a-24: mi bskyod pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:229a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i gtso bo la sogs pa dkyil 'khor pa 'di dag thams cad rigs kyi bdag po dang bcas shing shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:229a-26: de ltar na 'di dag ni sgrub pa chen po dang dbang gi 'bras bu chen po yin no //
T02TD1892E:229b-0: de nas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul thams cad bdag nyid kyi rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma'i snying gar cho ga bzhin @229b du bcug la rang dang 'dra ba'i padma'i nang du zhu bar gyur pa bsams nas /
T02TD1892E:229b-1: de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang /
T02TD1892E:229b-2: phyi'i mchod pa'i chogs rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD1892E:229b-3: mchod pa dang mchod pa byed pa po dbyer med du nga rgyal byas nas /
T02TD1892E:229b-4: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1892E:229b-5: de nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa la 'di ltar bstod par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:229b-6: rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che //
T02TD1892E:229b-7: mi rtog nam mkhar rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1892E:229b-8: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02TD1892E:229b-9: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1892E:229b-10: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
T02TD1892E:229b-11: rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po //
T02TD1892E:229b-12: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog / ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1892E:229b-13: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02TD1892E:229b-14: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02TD1892E:229b-15: rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med //
T02TD1892E:229b-16: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1892E:229b-17: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02TD1892E:229b-18: rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po //
T02TD1892E:229b-19: dkyil 'khor mchog gsum yi ge gsum //
T02TD1892E:229b-20: rdo rje dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1892E:229b-21: don yod rgyal po rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1892E:229b-22: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02TD1892E:229b-23: rang bzhin dag pa las byung ba //
T02TD1892E:229b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1892E:229b-25: de nas bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga 'di ltar bya ste /
T02TD1892E:229b-26: mdun du yi ge yam yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can ba dan gyis mtshan pa bsams la /
T02TD1892E:229b-27: de'i steng du ram yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum rab tu 'bar ba'i gzugs can dmigs la /
T02TD1892E:229b-28: de'i steng du aa yongs su gyur pa las thod pa de'i nang du bdud rtsi lnga bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um /
T02TD1892E:229b-29: zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs par bsams nas /
T02TD1892E:229b-30: de'i 'og tu bsreg pa dang 'bar ba la sogs pas yang dag par sbyangs la /
T02TD1892E:229b-31: aom gyis byin gyis brlabs par bsams nas /
T02TD1892E:229b-32: de'i steng du h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bsam mo //
T02TD1892E:229b-33: de nas yi ge aom gyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug la /
T02TD1892E:229b-34: bdud rtsi lnga po de nyid kyi nang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:229b-35: de nas bsreg ba dang 'bar bas yi ge aom dang rdo rje de nyid du zhu bar gyur par bsams la /
T02TD1892E:230a-1: pa'i bdud rtsi de lca la yi ge h'um las rdo rje bkod pa'i lce bzang po dang /
T02TD1892E:230a-2: ro rdo rjes bstabs pas bdag nyid dang /
T02TD1892E:230a-3: dkyil 'khor ba rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:230a-4: de ltar dkyil 'khor 'byin pa nas bdud rtsi myong ba'i bar du ni /
T02TD1892E:230a-5: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02TD1892E:230a-6: sems dbang du gyur pa thob na zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1892E:230a-7: thig le rnal 'byor bsgom par bya ba yin pas sems brtan par bya ba'i don du las kyi rgyal po mchog bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:230a-8: de bas na ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis khams gsum po snang bar byas nas rang gi lha'i rnam par byas la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:230a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ni bdag nyid la gzhug go //
T02TD1892E:230a-10: bdag ni ye shes sems dpa' la gzhug go //
T02TD1892E:230a-11: ye shes sems dpa' ni mtshan mar ro //
T02TD1892E:230a-12: mtshan ma ni tsa na ka'i tshad kyi thig ler bcug la /
T02TD1892E:230a-13: thig le'i dbus su bskyed pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo skad cig tsam gyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:230a-14: 'dir bsnyen pa la sogs pa ni chen po'i sgrar brjod do //
T02TD1892E:230a-15: tsa na ka'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du de ltar bsgoms la /
T02TD1892E:230a-16: yang thig le'i dbus su chud pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs su snang ba las sa bon du bsam mo //
T02TD1892E:230a-17: sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams las mtshan ma'i mtshan ma'i 'od zer rnams las ye shes sems dpar bsam mo //
T02TD1892E:230a-18: ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer spros pa las /
T02TD1892E:230a-19: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i bdag nyid bsam mo //
T02TD1892E:230a-20: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i 'od zer gyi snang ba las /
T02TD1892E:230a-21: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin du gnas par bsams la /
T02TD1892E:230a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo de kun du spros pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis khams gsum pa ma lus par de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs kyis khyab par bsgoms nas /
T02TD1892E:230a-23: yang de bzhin du thig le'i bar du bsdu zhing slar spro ba dang /
T02TD1892E:230a-24: slar yang thig le'i bar du bsdu ba dang /
T02TD1892E:230b-0: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor lo bsgom pa ji srid 'dod kyi bar du byas pa ni thig le'i rnal 'byor @230b ro ;
T02TD1892E:230b-1: / de'i 'og tu nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshin gshegs pa rnams bdag nyid kyi khar bcug ste /
T02TD1892E:230b-2: byang chub kyi sems zhu bar gyur ba las rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste /
T02TD1892E:230b-3: snga ma bzhin du rang dang 'dra ba'i padma'i lte bar byang chub kyi sems zhu ba'i thig ler bsams la der yi ge hr'i:yongs su gyur pa las padma tsa na ka'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du bsgoms la /
T02TD1892E:230b-4: padma'i lte ba'i dbus su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa'i rim pas skad cig gis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1892E:230b-5: 'dir bsnyen pa la sogs pa ni chen po'i sgrar brjod do //
T02TD1892E:230b-6: 'di la ji srid du sems brtan par ma gyur pa de srid du shin tu spro bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1892E:230b-7: sems brtan par gyur nas ni yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang spro ba dang bsdu bar bya ba ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD1892E:230b-8: de nas bsgoms pas skyo na /
T02TD1892E:230b-9: yi ge dgu po ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon yongs su bskor te gnas pa la bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD1892E:230b-10: aom a'a:aom ma ni padme h'um h'um /
T02TD1892E:230b-11: zhes bya ba'i sngags zlos shing sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje re re zhing ngam thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid can dang ye shes sems dpa' dang de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dang /
T02TD1892E:230b-12: ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig lnga po'i bdag nyid can bsams la /
T02TD1892E:230b-13: de re re zhing 'byin pa dang 'jug pa'i rlung gis rim gyis sam cig car spro ba dang bsdu bar bya zhing /
T02TD1892E:230b-14: myur ba dang ngal chen pa'i nyes pa dang bral bar sngags kyi de kho na nyid la lhag par mos pas /
T02TD1892E:230b-15: gsang sngags yi ge dgu po bzlas par bya ste 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1892E:230b-16: de nas bsgom pa dang bzlas pas dub pa bsal ba'i don du lha mo'i glus bskul la /
T02TD1892E:230b-17: spyi bo'i steng du mtho gang tsam gyi sa dpags par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD1892E:230b-18: aom dkar po gnas par rnam par bsams la /
T02TD1892E:230b-19: de las bdud rtsi 'bab pas bdag nyid tshim par byas par bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1892E:230b-20: 'di ni brtan par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1892E:230b-21: de nas yang ngal bso la sngags kyi de kho na nyid la lhag par mos pas ji srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD1892E:231a-0: de nas gshegs su gsol bar 'dod na rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer spros pas dkyil 'khor gyi @231a * //
T02TD1892E:231a-1: 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i phyi rol du spros la mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsams te mchod pa'i sprin spros /
T02TD1892E:231a-2: des bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD1892E:231a-3: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor aom kram to ba sarbba sa tv'artha /
T02TD1892E:231a-4: siddhi ma datt'a ya nu ga /
T02TD1892E:231a-5: gatstsha tv'am buddha bi sha yam /
T02TD1892E:231a-6: phun ra ga ma na yatstsha:/
T02TD1892E:231a-7: zhes bya ba 'dis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1892E:231a-8: de'i sprul pa rnams bdag nyid la bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1892E:231a-9: de nas bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir 'di ltar smon lam gdab par bya ste /
T02TD1892E:231a-10: rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i dpal //
T02TD1892E:231a-11: sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes pa ni //
T02TD1892E:231a-12: dge ba 'di yis thob gyur nas //
T02TD1892E:231a-13: 'gro bas kyang ni de thob shog / phyag rgya chen po'i don grub phyir //
T02TD1892E:231a-14: spyod gang sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa //
T02TD1892E:231a-15: 'gro ba'i don ni bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1892E:231a-16: spyod de nyid dang bdag ldan shog / de bzhin gshegs rnams thabs gang gis //
T02TD1892E:231a-17: thams cad mkhyen nyid go 'phang brnyes //
T02TD1892E:231a-18: dag cing yan lag kun rdzogs pa //
T02TD1892E:231a-19: thabs de dang ni bdag ldan shog / sgrib pa thams cad yongs zad phyir //
T02TD1892E:231a-20: sangs rgyas kyis sngags shes rab gang //
T02TD1892E:231a-21: rnam kun mkhyen nyid kun bya'i phyir //
T02TD1892E:231a-22: bdag gis shes rab de thob shog / rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1892E:231a-23: rab mnyam gzhag ste gnas par bya //
T02TD1892E:231a-24: rang gi dkyil 'khor pa tshul du //
T02TD1892E:231a-25: khams gsum po ni blta bar bya //
T02TD1892E:231a-26: bza' dang btung ba dus su ni //
T02TD1892E:231a-27: skad cig ma yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1892E:231a-28: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsams te //
T02TD1892E:231a-29: bza' dang bca' sogs rnam sbyangs la ;
T02TD1892E:231a-30: / bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga yang //
T02TD1892E:231a-31: rdo rje lce yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1892E:231a-32: rang gi lhag lhag gtso bor gyur //
T02TD1892E:231a-33: dkyil 'khor snying gar bsams nas su //
T02TD1892E:231a-34: rang sngags byin brlabs ro yis ni //
T02TD1892E:231a-35: sku yi rdo rje sogs tshim bya //
T02TD1892E:231a-36: mchod pa 'di nyid dam pa ste //
T02TD1892E:231a-37: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsngags //
T02TD1892E:231a-38: 'di nyid nang gi sbyin sreg ni //
T02TD1892E:231a-39: yin par gsang 'dus las bshad do //
T02TD1892E:231a-40: khrus kyi dus su spyan sogs kyis //
T02TD1892E:231a-41: dbang bskur lta bur rnam par spyad //
T02TD1892E:231a-42: dran pa brjed sogs nyes pa yis //
T02TD1892E:231a-43: gal te dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02TD1892E:231a-44: de tshe dam tshig rdo rje zhes //
T02TD1892E:231b-0: bya ba rang @231b gi snying gar bsgom //
T02TD1892E:231b-1: de yi thugs kar yi ge kham //
T02TD1892E:231b-2: mtshan ma'i dbus su chu dbang bsam //
T02TD1892E:231b-3: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sogs //
T02TD1892E:231b-4: cho ga ji bzhin dgod par bya //
T02TD1892E:231b-5: sku gsung thugs kyi dbus chud pa'i //
T02TD1892E:231b-6: de yi sa bon kha nas bzlas //
T02TD1892E:231b-7: dam tshig nyams pa'i nyes pa ni //
T02TD1892E:231b-8: sbyong 'dod dam tshig rdo rje yis //
T02TD1892E:231b-9: gsang sngags yongs su bzlas nas ni //
T02TD1892E:231b-10: bsgom pa'i mthar ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1892E:231b-11: nyal ba'i dus su rang gi ni //
T02TD1892E:231b-13: yang na stong nyid bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1892E:231b-14: rnal 'byor pas ni ci bder nyal //
T02TD1892E:231b-15: gnyid sad pa yi dus su ni //
T02TD1892E:231b-16: lha mos bskul ba dran byas la //
T02TD1892E:231b-17: mal nas langs te rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1892E:231b-18: snga ma bzhin du bsam gtan spyad //
T02TD1892E:231b-21: byang chub 'od kyi ngor mdzad de //
T02TD1892E:231b-22: mar me mdzad kyis 'di byas so //
T02TD1892E:231b-23: sgrub thabs 'di ni legs bris pa //
T02TD1892E:231b-24: bdag gis dag ba gang thob pa //
T02TD1892E:231b-25: de yis 'gro ba thams cad ni //
T02TD1892E:231b-26: rdo rje chos kyi gnas thob shog /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD1892E:231b-27: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rim pas bsgrubs pa ;
T02TD1892E:231b-28: / slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1892E:231b-30: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02TD1892E:231b-31: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
